item.title: [Leetcode 768/769] Max Chunks To Make Sorted
item.description: Question 1 Leetcode 769: Max Chunks To Make Sorted II Given an array arr of integers (not necessarily distinct), we split the array into some number of “chunks” (partitions), and individually sort each chunk. After concatenating them, the result equals the sorted array. What is the most number of chunks we could have made? Note: arr will have length in range [1, 2000]. arr[i] will be an integer in range [0, 10**8].
